title: Laws removing barriers to SSPs
name: NoLwRmUnc
description: Dummy variable indicating whether the state has no law removing barriers or uncertainty as to SSP legality (0=no, 1=yes)
source_long: Fernández-Viña MH, Prood NE, Herpolsheimer A, Waimberg J, Burris S. State Laws Governing Syringe Services Programs and Participant Syringe Possession, 2014-2019. Public Health Reports. 2020;135:128S-137S. doi:10.1177/0033354920921817
comments:
The variables included here are very high-level and for August 1, 2019. For more detailed and longitudinal data, we recommend the following datasets from LawAtlas:

    Syringe Possesssion Laws from 2012 to 2017
    Syringe Distribution Laws from 2012 to 2017
    Syringe Service Program Laws, 2019
